priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-LYM Version 4 Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C130256

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-LYM Version 4 Test Name Terminology

definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 test name.
name: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire FACT-LYM Version 4 Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by lumps or swelling in certain parts of my body (e.g., neck, armpits, or groin).
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Bothered by Lumps or Swelling

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I am bothered by side effects of treatment.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Bothered by Treatment Side Effect

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I have certain parts of my body where I experience pain.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Certain Parts of Body Have Pain
terms.submissionValue: FAC018-Certain Parts of Body Have Pain
synonyms: FAC018-Certain Parts of Body Have Pain

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am content with the quality of my life right now.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Content With Quality of My Life
terms.submissionValue: FAC018-Content With Quality of My Life
synonyms: FAC018-Content With Quality of My Life

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Additional Concerns: Because of my illness, I have difficulty planning for the future.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Difficulty Planning for Future

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am enjoying the things I usually do for fun.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun
terms.submissionValue: FAC018-Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun
synonyms: FAC018-Enjoy Things I Usually Do for Fun

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I feel isolated from others because of my illness or treatment.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Feel Isolated Because of Illness

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Social/Family Well-Being: I get emotional support from my family.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - Get Emotional Support From Family

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am able to enjoy life.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - I Am Able to Enjoy Life

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Functional Well-Being: I am able to work (include work at home).
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - I Am Able to Work

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by fevers (episodes of high body temperature).
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - I Am Bothered by Fevers

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Additional Concerns: I am bothered by itching.
terms.preferredTerm: FACT-LYM Version 4 - I Am Bothered by Itching

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Lymphoma Version 4 - Physical Well-Being: I am forced to spend time in bed.
